text: The 2016 FIFA Extraordinary Congress was held at the Hallenstadion in Zürich, Switzerland, on 26 February 2016. This special session of the FIFA Congress was called as a result of the 2015 FIFA corruption case. The session included the passage of a major statutory reforms proposal as well as the election of Gianni Infantino to replace Sepp Blatter as the President of FIFA. Category:2016 in association football Category:2016 in Switzerland Category:FIFA Category:Zürich Category:February 2016 events
title: 2016 FIFA Extraordinary Congress
